mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON B.MNO = M.MNO WHERE B.BOARD_DEL = 0
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND M.MNM LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, MNO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CON) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mno}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardCon})
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CON, B.BOARD_HIT, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARD_DT, M.MNO, M.MNM FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON B.MNO = M.MNO WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_HIT = BOARD_HIT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_DEL = 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM OBOARD WHERE OB_DEL = 0

SELECT O.OB_NO, O.MNO, O.MNM, O.OB_CON FROM (SELECT O.OB_NO, M.MNO, M.MNM, O.OB_CON, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY O.OB_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM OBOARD O INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON O.MNO = M.MNO WHERE O.OB_DEL = 0) O WHERE O.RNUM BETWEEN #{startCnt} AND #{endCnt}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OBOARD(OB_NO, MNO, OB_CON) VALUES(OBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mno}, #{obCon})
